Package game.monologue

Class Monologue_Toad

java.lang.Object
game.monologue.Monologue
game.monologue.Monologue_Toad
public class Monologue_Toad
extends Monologue
This class represents the Monologue that is used by Toad to deliver speech lines to the player
Author:
Garret Yong Shern Min

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String speak​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)
    This method returns a random statement from the selection of dialogue provided in the constructor based on the status of the actor whom is being spoken to In this class there are 4 statements: 1 : The Princess is depending on you! You are our only hope.

  • Method Details

    • speak

      public java.lang.String speak​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)
      This method returns a random statement from the selection of dialogue provided in the constructor based on the status of the actor whom is being spoken to In this class there are 4 statements: 1 : The Princess is depending on you! You are our only hope. 2 : Being imprisoned in these walls can drive a fungus crazy :( 3 : You might need a wrench to smash Koopa's hard shells. 4 : You better get back to finding the Power Stars. Statement 3 cannot be returned if the actor has a Wrench Statement 4 cannot be returned if the actor has consumed a Power Star
      Specified by:
      speak in class Monologue
      Parameters:
      actor - an Actor whom is the target the dialogue is meant to be directed at
      Returns:
      a string statement from the constructor based on certain requirements of the actor's current status
